message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to purchase this product. Given its incredible value and potential, I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I propose a starting price of $1,400,000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. I would like to propose a price of $1,300,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but the value of this product is truly significant. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,375,000 to find a mutually beneficial agreement.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I am willing to increase my offer to $1,350,000.
Bob, we're getting closer.  I'm willing to agree to $1,360,000, but that's my final offer.
Considering the value of the product and our previous discussions, I believe $1,345,000 is a fair price. I hope you can accept this offer.
